main event: On June 6, 1967, several witnesses in Manchester, Pennsylvania, reported seeing unidentified flying objects displaying several bright white lights in the sky.
interesting points: The objects appeared to hover and move, with varying light intensities., One witness described an elliptical-shaped object with flickering lights that was about 150 to 200 feet in diameter., The duration of one sighting was reported as approximately 5 minutes., The police contacted the nearest Air Force base, which led to an investigation and report., The investigation concluded with the objects remaining unidentified.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with bright white lights
witness description: witnesses reported seeing bright lights and described different shapes, including elliptical and round objects
